1.「ユーちゃんを どの髪型にしてあげるんバ？|<break>: Which haircut are you going to give Yu?<break>

2.「ん？ それだと 今の髪型と変わらないバ。|<bw_break>: Hmm? That's no different than your current|hairstyle, ba.<bw_break>

3.「<%sM_Hair>だと | こんなイメージに なるんバ。| この髪型で キメ: <%sM_Hair> gives me this image. Can I go all|out with this haircut?<yesno><close>

4.「やめるんバね。| ユーちゃんの髪型を 変えたくなったら| いつでも 来るといい: You're quitting, aren't you? If you ever|want to change your hair, you can come back|anytime!

5.「艶もあり さっぱりした印象を受けますね。| 手入れが 少々 大変そうですが|: It looks shiny and refreshing. It looks a|bit of a pain to take care of, but let Bud|be responsible for that.

7.「普段の髪型に戻すと 気持ちが落ち着きますね。| バドの編み込みの 手際の良さに: I feel so much better when I get back to my|normal hairstyle. I'm always amazed at the|deftness of Bud's braiding.
